content.description: Fires quickly in four fixed directions.

fields.name: Union
fields.value: Evolves at level 8 with **Phiera Der Tuphello** and **Tiragisu** at level 8 to make **Phieraggi**

fields.name: Unlocks
fields.value: Can be unlocked by surviving for 15 minutes with Pugnala.

fields.name: Leveling
fields.value:
(1) Base 
(2) +1 Projectiles 
(3) Passes through 2 more enemies
(4) +1 Projectiles 
(5) Damage +5 
(6) Passes through 2 more enemies 
(7) +1 Projectiles, Damage +5 
(8) Passes through 2 more enemies

content.title: Eight The Sparrow
